Bendigo Property Market Update: What to Expect in 2026

10 November 2025 John Smith

Bendigo Market Shows Strong Resilience

The Bendigo property market continues to be a top performer in regional Victoria, showing strong growth and resilience throughout 2025. As we head into 2026, here‚Äôs what we‚Äôre seeing.

Key Market Drivers

  • Lifestyle Appeal: The ‚Äúwork from home‚Äù trend continues to benefit Bendigo, with buyers from Melbourne seeking more space and better affordability.
  • Strong Infrastructure: Significant investments in local health, education, and transport are making Bendigo an even more attractive place to live.
  • Rental Demand: Rental yields remain high as vacancy rates stay low, drawing strong interest from property investors.

What This Means For You

For Buyers: Competition is still strong for A-grade properties. It is essential to have your financing sorted with a pre-approval before you make an offer.

For Sellers: With high demand, it‚Äôs a great time to sell. However, styling your home and pricing it correctly are still key to achieving a top result.
